dosage_child: 10-15 mg/kg per dose up to 4 doses/day
dosage_elderly: 1 tablet every 8 hours; consult doctor if liver disease
side_effects: Nausea, dizziness; risk of liver damage if overdosed
layman_summary: Helps reduce fever and body pain. Do not take more than 4 tablets a day.

dosage_elderly: As per adult but use caution
layman_summary: Reduces fever/pain. Follow dose on label.

dosage_child: Not for children under guidance; consult pediatrician
dosage_elderly: As per adult dosing with renal adjustment
side_effects: Diarrhea, allergic reactions; complete full course
layman_summary: Used to treat bacterial infections. Finish full course as prescribed.

dosage_child: Use pediatric dosing as per label
layman_summary: Helps control allergy symptoms. May cause drowsiness.
